Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Westbound Reroute near 71st/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: WB 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, South Chicago, Keith, 69th, King Drive and 71st: due to, street blockage near 71st/Cottage Grove

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, South Chicago, Keith, 69th, King Drive and 71st: due to, street blockage near 71st/Cottage Grove.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
